chunks.zh: 父母私吞彩礼，是否可以起诉要回来
chunks.en: Can I sue my parents to get back the bride price they pocketed?

chunks.zh: 由于重男轻女的思想太严重，之前口头答应的会返回的 10w 彩礼钱现在不给了，夫妻双方能否起诉父母要回来？
chunks.en: Due to the severe patriarchal mindset, the 100,000 yuan bride price that was verbally promised to be returned is now not being given. Can the couple sue their parents to get it back?

chunks.zh: 之前口头承诺会给的不知道还有没有语音证据，最近的聊天记录显示他直接说的是欠的不给了，能否作为直接证据进行起诉要回来。
chunks.en: I don't know if there is any voice evidence of the previous verbal promise, and the recent chat records show that he directly said that the debt will not be given. Can this be used as direct evidence to sue for it back?

chunks.zh: 类似的案例有这个： https://wenshu.court.gov.cn/website/wenshu/181107ANFZ0BXSK4/index.html?docId=pl5PTLOzdgk6/KN7b1FW5MKA1bjKN21Mf789LNNAUnrnDGvEdDUvQvUKq3u+IEo4fFmPNBQpL94jS5Iai5fOqHt8hPAwc2+Y72q8nYjlNVOWEgBklO+jM2xhX6q35F/2
chunks.en: A similar case is this: https://wenshu.court.gov.cn/website/wenshu/181107ANFZ0BXSK4/index.html?docId=pl5PTLOzdgk6/KN7b1FW5MKA1bjKN21Mf789LNNAUnrnDGvEdDUvQvUKq3u+IEo4fFmPNBQpL94jS5Iai5fOqHt8hPAwc2+Y72q8nYjlNVOWEgBklO+jM2xhX6q35F/2

chunks.zh: @shuang #3 慷他人之慨，你来给这 10w
chunks.en: @shuang #3 You're being generous with someone else's money. Why don't you give them the 100,000?

chunks.zh: 今日🐢2ex ，楼上几位震撼到我了
chunks.en: Today's turtle (referring to someone groveling to foreigners) on 2EX, I'm shocked by the comments above.

chunks.zh: 要算养育之恩是吧，那女方为什么不给男方父母 10 万块钱用于答谢男方父母对男方的养育之恩？
chunks.en: Are we going to calculate the debt of raising him? Then why doesn't the woman give 100,000 yuan to the man's parents to thank them for raising him?

chunks.zh: 这帖子好啊，又可以更新 Block 名单了
chunks.en: This post is good, I can update my Block list again.

chunks.zh: 10 万，至于起诉父母吗，这世道怎么了
chunks.en: 100,000, is it worth suing your parents? What's wrong with this world?

chunks.zh: @shuang 为了 10w 块骗自己女儿？
chunks.en: @shuang You'd lie to your own daughter for 100,000?

chunks.zh: @Shanky 父母关系就值 10w 吗，好歹养这么大。是怎么把双方关系处成这样子的
chunks.en: @Shanky Is the parent-child relationship only worth 100,000? They raised you for so long. How did the relationship become like this?

chunks.zh: 退一万步，即使觉得私吞彩礼不对，大不了选择减少联系甚至不再来往，也不至于对簿公堂吧
chunks.en: Taking a step back, even if you feel it's wrong to pocket the bride price, you can choose to reduce contact or even stop seeing each other. It's not worth going to court.

chunks.zh: 不了解具体情况，网友不好评论。清官难断家务事
chunks.en: Without knowing the specific situation, it's difficult for netizens to comment. Even an upright official can hardly resolve family disputes.

chunks.zh: 可以趁结婚时间还短，起诉离婚，基本上可以把彩礼返还，之后你和老婆再结婚，远离家庭就行了
chunks.en: You can take advantage of the short time of marriage, file for divorce, and basically get the bride price back. Then you and your wife can remarry and stay away from the family.

chunks.zh: https://tongyi.aliyun.com/farui/chat 试下
chunks.en: Try this: https://tongyi.aliyun.com/farui/chat

chunks.zh: @Rayvonme #7 父母养你成人，这笔帐是不是也要算一下？--------------------那就当成买断费处理？
chunks.en: @Rayvonme #7 Should we also calculate the cost of your parents raising you to adulthood? -------------------- Then treat it as a buyout fee?

chunks.zh: 所以你是 gg 还是 mm
chunks.en: So are you male or female?

chunks.zh: 不知道怎么曲解成卖女儿了。某些人的观点就好比：虽然你养育了我 20 年，但既然你这次骗了我，那我可抓住你的把柄了，接下来我就不客气了，我要到法庭告你。父母做的不对，自己也没必要得理不让人，锋芒毕露，为了 10w 去起诉。
chunks.en: I don't know how it's being twisted into selling a daughter. Some people's views are like this: Although you raised me for 20 years, since you cheated me this time, I can grab your handle. Next, I will not be polite, I will sue you in court. The parents are wrong, but you don't have to be aggressive and show off your edge, and sue for 100,000.

chunks.zh: @Erroad #23 楼上几位不可能是🐢，大概率是自己作为父母，也是有女儿且重男轻女的，看到这么多人不支持父母私吞彩礼钱破防了。
chunks.en: @Erroad #23 The people upstairs are unlikely to be turtles (groveling to foreigners). It is highly probable that they themselves are parents, also have daughters, and are patriarchal. Seeing so many people not supporting parents pocketing bride prices has triggered them.

chunks.zh: 必须起诉他们，谁叫你们重男轻女，儿子就是人？女儿就不是了？老了直接让儿子养老呗，不退换彩礼，直接让他们去里面养老哈哈哈 笑死我了，实在忍不住
chunks.en: You must sue them. Who told you to be patriarchal? Is the son human and the daughter not? When they are old, let the son take care of them. If they don't return the bride price, let them go to a nursing home. Hahaha, I can't help laughing.

chunks.zh: @Erroad 国龟就是这样，活该他们被彩礼盘剥到死
chunks.en: @Erroad That's how national turtles (groveling to their own country) are. They deserve to be exploited to death by the bride price.

chunks.zh: @shuang 我有预感，你将来也是这样出尔反尔、重男轻女的父母
chunks.en: @shuang I have a feeling that you will also be parents who go back on their word and are patriarchal in the future.

chunks.zh: 我的观点：也许父母做的不对，之前承诺要返还彩礼，但没有返回。那么我会选择和他们进行深入的沟通。即使还不还，那我心里不舒服也认了，就当父母之前没答应过返还。父母也有做错的时候。父母子女之间有吵架，有争论很正常。不到万不得已，还是不要走起诉这条路吧。
chunks.en: My opinion: Maybe the parents did something wrong, promising to return the bride price before, but not returning it. Then I would choose to communicate with them in depth. Even if they don't return it, I will accept my discomfort and just assume that my parents never promised to return it. Parents also make mistakes. It is normal for parents and children to have quarrels and arguments. Unless absolutely necessary, it is best not to take the road of suing.
